page.title: 04WRAWBY STREET - BRIGG
page.content: This is traditionally{Brigg's main {shopping street}and remains so although there is a new shopping precinct by the riverside. Most people still use this busy one way street for their everyday needs with two greengrocers, bakeries, shoe shops, record shops, mens' outfitters four boutiques, a newsagent, pharmacy and D.I.Y. Store. In addition are two outlets selling jewellery, three hair salons, four public houses and shops selling fancy and household goods. Boots the Chemist is noted as one of the few remaining chainstores, four others having closed in recent years, including Woolworth, as the trend is towards smaller units. Several businesses have changed from retail to office use resulting in three estate agents, two building societies and an insurance brokers. The two opticians
